funcs.description: Create a new QuadTree, which is a kind of Rectangle
funcs.name: QuadTree

funcs.description: Get a list of quads in which this point is contained
funcs.name: getQuads
param: list Optional existing list to append to

funcs.description: Get a list of items in this point's deepest quad
funcs.name: getItems

funcs.description: Add an item into this QuadTree. Split to sub quads if needed.
funcs.name: addToQuad

funcs.description: reset this quad, removing items and sub-quads
funcs.name: resetQuad
